application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

decision_conditions: The lighting hereby approved must be directed so as to prevent light spillage into neighbouring properties including outside space and to prevent upward glare.Reason: To ensure the proper implementation of the lighting proposals in the interests of the amenity of the site and the areaas a whole and to prevent light pollution.

Prior to the beneficial occupation of the development details of the "Day Light cut off sensor or timer switch" referenced on drawing number AD19-AP1-C18 shall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The lighting shall only be operated in accordance with the approved details.Reason: To ensure the proper implementation of the lighting proposals in the interests of the amenity of the site and the areaas a whole and to prevent light pollution.
description: Details required for Condition 18 (External Lights) of planning permission 20/01216/FUL (Appeal Ref: APP/Z5630/W/20/3260562)(Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of new residential building comprising 6no.x dwellings with associated bins, cycle store, parking and dropped kerb widening to side and rear of site)
